definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[לבא]] (√ of foll.; v. Ar. labuw’ah;un, lab0’ah;un, laba0’ah;un lioness, cf. [[לָבִיא]]; v. perh. also Ph. n.pr. [[לבא]] CIS:i. 147; Jastrow:JBL xi. (1892) 120 f. comp. Tel el-Am. n.pr. Labâ’ (Bez:BM Labay[a]); poss. is also Lapaya, which Wkl:TA, 1896 rds.; deriv. only poet.)
